trans-unit.source: Provides support for programmatically invoking XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: Dá suporte para invocar programaticamente a descoberta de serviços Web XML.

trans-unit.source: XML Web service discovery is the process of locating, or discovering, one or more related documents that describe available XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: Descoberta do serviço Web XML é o processo de localização, ou descoberta, um ou mais relacionadas a documentos que descrevem os XML Web services disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: It is through XML Web services discovery that XML Web service clients learn about the available XML Web services at a given URL and how to use them.
trans-unit.target: É por meio da descoberta de serviços da Web em XML que os clientes do serviço Web XML Saiba mais sobre o XML Web services disponíveis em uma determinada URL e como usá-los.

trans-unit.source: XML Web services discovery works from the premise that you have already obtained the URL to a discovery document, possibly through a directory service, such as http://uddi.microsoft.com, however, you do not have the details about the XML Web services offered.
trans-unit.target: Descoberta funciona o local que você já tiver obtido a URL para um documento de descoberta, possivelmente por meio de um serviço de diretório, como os XML Web services http://uddi.microsoft.com, no entanto, você não tiver os detalhes sobre os serviços Web XML oferecidos.

trans-unit.source: Through XML Web services discovery, you can discover the details about the XML Web services listed in a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> at a specific URL.
trans-unit.target: Por meio da descoberta de serviços da Web em XML, você pode descobrir os detalhes sobre os serviços Web XML listados em um <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> em uma URL específica.

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service client starts XML Web services discovery by supplying a URL to either the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Um cliente de serviço Web XML inicia a descoberta de serviços da Web em XML, fornecendo uma URL para o o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this URL refers to a discovery document, which in turn refers to documents that describe one or more XML Web services, which are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, essa URL refere-se a um documento de descoberta, que por sua vez, refere-se a documentos que descrevem um ou mais serviços Web XML, que são adicionados ao <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: At that point, only that document is downloaded and verified to point to valid information about XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: Nesse momento, somente esse documento é baixado e verificado para apontar para informações válidas sobre XML Web services.

trans-unit.source: However, the references contained in that document are not verified at this stage.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as referências contidas no documento não são verificadas neste estágio.

trans-unit.source: Instead they are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, eles são adicionados para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To verify that the references are valid, invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods, which add valid referenced documents to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar se as referências são válidas, invoque o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> métodos que adicionar documentos referenciados válidos para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Last, if a client wants to save the discovery results to disk, invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Último, se um cliente deseja salvar os resultados de descoberta no disco, chamar o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If programmatic access to XML Web services discovery is not needed, the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] ships the Web Services Discovery tool (Disco.exe) for discovering XML Web services within a command prompt.
trans-unit.target: Se não for necessário o acesso programático a descoberta de serviços da Web em XML, o [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] a ferramenta de descoberta de serviços Web (Disco.exe) é fornecido para a descoberta de serviços Web XML em um prompt de comando.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see [Web Services Discovery Tool (Disco.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes, consulte [ferramenta de descoberta de serviços da Web (Disco.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979).

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a Web Form demonstrating how to use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol> class together with the other classes in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery> namespace to programmatically invoke XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir é um formulário da Web que demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol> classe junto com as outras classes no <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery> namespace para chamar programaticamente os XML Web services descoberta.

trans-unit.source: The code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo tem uma caixa de texto que aceita a entrada do usuário, que é uma possível ameaça à segurança.

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, a páginas da Web ASP.NET validam a entrada do usuário não inclui elementos HTML ou script.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de explorações de script](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets information in addition to references found in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações além das referências encontradas no documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> containing additional information found in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> contendo informações adicionais sobre encontrada no documento discovery.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.AdditionalInformation%2A> property primarily contains SOAP bindings, represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding> class, defined in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.AdditionalInformation%2A> propriedade principalmente contém associações de SOAP, representadas pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding> classe, definida no documento discovery.

trans-unit.source: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.
trans-unit.target: A URL em que começa a descoberta de Serviços Web XML.

trans-unit.source: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Descobre a URL fornecida para determinar se é um documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> contendo os resultados da descoberta de Serviços Web XML na URL fornecida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> method expects that the supplied URL is a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> método espera que a URL fornecida é um documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: If the URL refers to a service description or an XML schema an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se a URL se refere a uma descrição de serviço ou um esquema XML uma exceção será lançada.

trans-unit.source: To discover an XML schema or a service description invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para descobrir um esquema XML ou uma descrição de serviço chamar o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se a URL fornecida aponta para um documento de descoberta válida, o documento discovery na URL fornecida é adicionado para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, referências dentro do documento de descoberta são adicionadas para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> coleção, mas não verificados para apontar para documentos de descoberta válida.

trans-unit.source: To verify the references, point to valid discovery documents to invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Verifique se as referências, aponte para documentos de descoberta válida para invocar o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a Web Form that populates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the details about the documents in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property together with the references found in each document during XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir é um formulário da Web que preenche um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com os detalhes sobre os documentos a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> propriedade junto com as referências encontradas em cada documento durante a descoberta de serviços da Web em XML.

trans-unit.source: The `PopulateGrid` method fills the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the results from a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> invocation followed by a call to <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O `PopulateGrid` método preenchimentos a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com os resultados de uma <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> invocação seguido por uma chamada para <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <see cref="F:System.Net.HttpStatusCode.OK" />.
trans-unit.target: Acessar a URL fornecida retornou um código de status HTTP diferente de <see cref="F:System.Net.HttpStatusCode.OK" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="url" /> parameteris a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="url" /> é uma URL válida, mas não aponta para um documento de descoberta válido.

trans-unit.source: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.
trans-unit.target: A URL em que começa a descoberta de Serviços Web XML.

trans-unit.source: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document, service description or an XML Schema Definition (XSD) schema.
trans-unit.target: Descobre a URL fornecida para determinar se ela é um documento de descoberta, uma descrição do serviço ou um esquema de definição de esquema de XSD (definição de esquema XML).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> contendo os resultados da descoberta de Serviços Web XML na URL fornecida.

trans-unit.source: If the <paramref name="url" /> parameter refers to a service description or an XSD Schema, a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> is created in memory for it.
trans-unit.target: Se o parâmetro <paramref name="url" /> se refere a uma descrição de serviço ou a um esquema de XSD, um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> é criado na memória para ele.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> method discovers whether the supplied URL is a discovery document, service description or XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> método descobre se a URL fornecida é um documento de descoberta, a descrição do serviço ou o esquema XSD.

trans-unit.source: If it is known that the URL only refers to a discovery document, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> method might be invoked.
trans-unit.target: Se ele for conhecido que a URL somente se refere a um documento de descoberta, o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> método pode ser chamado.

trans-unit.source: If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, XSD schema, or service description, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: Se a URL fornecida aponta para um documento de descoberta válida, o esquema XSD ou a descrição do serviço, o documento discovery na URL fornecida é adicionado para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> coleções.

trans-unit.source: When the supplied URL refers to an XSD schema or Service Description a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> is created in memory and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: Quando a URL fornecida se refere a um esquema XSD ou a descrição do serviço um <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> é criado na memória e adicionado para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> coleções.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, referências dentro do documento de descoberta são adicionadas para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> coleção, mas não verificados para apontar para documentos de descoberta válida.

trans-unit.source: To verify that references point to valid discovery documents, invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar se as referências apontam para documentos de descoberta válida, invoque o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a Web Form that populates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the details about the documents in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property together with the references found in each document during an XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir é um formulário da Web que preenche um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com os detalhes sobre os documentos a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> propriedade junto com as referências encontradas em cada documento durante uma descoberta de serviços da Web em XML.

trans-unit.source: The `PopulateGrid` method fills the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the results from a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> invocation followed by a call to <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O `PopulateGrid` método preenchimentos a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com os resultados de uma <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> invocação seguido por uma chamada para <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <see cref="F:System.Net.HttpStatusCode.OK" />.
trans-unit.target: Acessar a URL fornecida retornou um código de status HTTP diferente de <see cref="F:System.Net.HttpStatusCode.OK" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="url" /> parameteris a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document, service description, or XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="url" /> é uma URL válida, mas não aponta para um documento de descoberta válido, uma descrição de serviço ou um esquema de XSD.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de documentos de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection" /> representing the collection of discovery documents found.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection" /> que representa a coleção de documentos de descoberta encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> collection is populated during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> coleção é preenchida durante chamadas para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: During invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Durante as chamadas para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> métodos, se a URL fornecida é um documento de descoberta válida, o documento será adicionado ao <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: During invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods, valid discovery document references in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Durante chamadas para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> métodos, referências de documento de descoberta válida no <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> coleta são adicionados para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a Web Form that populates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the details about the documents in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property discovered during XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir é um formulário da Web que preenche um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com os detalhes sobre os documentos a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> propriedade descoberta durante a descoberta de serviços da Web em XML.

trans-unit.source: The `PopulateGrid` method fills the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the results from a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> invocation followed by a call to <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O `PopulateGrid` método preenchimentos a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com os resultados de uma <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> invocação seguido por uma chamada para <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo tem uma caixa de texto que aceita a entrada do usuário, que é uma possível ameaça à segurança.

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, a páginas da Web ASP.NET validam a entrada do usuário não inclui elementos HTML ou script.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de explorações de script](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

trans-unit.source: Downloads the discovery document at the supplied URL into a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Baixa o documento de descoberta na URL fornecida em um objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the discovery document to download.
trans-unit.target: A URL do documento de descoberta a ser baixado.

trans-unit.source: Downloads the discovery document at the supplied URL into a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Baixa o documento de descoberta na URL fornecida em um objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> containing the document at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> que contém o documento na URL fornecida.

trans-unit.source: The download from the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <see cref="F:System.Net.HttpStatusCode.OK" />.
trans-unit.target: O download da URL fornecida retornou um código de status HTTP diferente de <see cref="F:System.Net.HttpStatusCode.OK" />.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the discovery document to download.
trans-unit.target: A URL do documento de descoberta a ser baixado.

trans-unit.source: The MIME encoding of the downloaded discovery document.
trans-unit.target: A codificação MIME do documento de descoberta baixado.

trans-unit.source: Downloads the discovery document at the supplied URL into a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object, setting the <paramref name="contentType" /> parameter to the MIME encoding of the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Baixa o documento de descoberta na URL fornecida em um objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, configurando o parâmetro <paramref name="contentType" /> para a codificação MIME do documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> containing the document at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> que contém o documento na URL fornecida.

trans-unit.source: The download from the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <see cref="F:System.Net.HttpStatusCode.OK" />.
trans-unit.target: O download da URL fornecida retornou um código de status HTTP diferente de <see cref="F:System.Net.HttpStatusCode.OK" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of exceptions that occurred during invocation of method from this class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de exceções que ocorreram durante a invocação do método desta classe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary" /> of exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary" /> de exceções.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> collection is populated with exceptions that occurred during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> coleção é preenchida com exceções que ocorreram durante as chamadas para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary> is cleared on invocation of these methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary> está desmarcada na invocação dos métodos a seguir.

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol" /> object to load any external references.
trans-unit.target: Instrui o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol" /> a carregar quaisquer referências externas.

trans-unit.source: Name of file to read in, containing the map of saved discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Nome do arquivo no qual ler e que contém o mapa de documentos de descoberta salvos.

trans-unit.source: Reads in a file containing a map of saved discovery documents populating the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References" /> properties, with discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions referenced in the file.
trans-unit.target: Lê um arquivo que contém um mapa de documentos de descoberta salvo populando as propriedades <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents" /> e <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References" /> com documentos de descoberta, esquemas de XSD (definição de esquema XML) e descrições do serviço referenciadas no arquivo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection" /> containing the results found in the file with the map of saved discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection" /> que contém os resultados encontrados no arquivo com o mapa de documentos de descoberta salvos.

trans-unit.source: The file format is a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile" /> class serialized into XML; however, one would typically create the file using only the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll(System.String,System.String)" /> method or Disco.exe.
trans-unit.target: O formato de arquivo é uma classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile" /> serializada em XML; no entanto, uma pessoa normalmente criaria o arquivo usando apenas o método <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll(System.String,System.String)" /> ou Disco.exe.

trans-unit.source: A file containing a map of saved discovery documents can be created by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> method or Disco.exe.
trans-unit.target: Um arquivo que contém um mapa de documentos de descoberta salvo pode ser criado pela <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> Disco.exe ou método.

trans-unit.source: The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: O `topLevelFilename` parâmetro deve incluir o caminho totalmente qualificado, se o arquivo não existe no diretório atual.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a Web Form that populates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the details about the documents and references found in an existing discovery map document using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir é um formulário da Web que preenche um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com os detalhes sobre os documentos e referências encontradas em uma existente descoberta mapa documento usando o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A collection of references founds in resolved discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de referências encontradas em documentos de descoberta resolvido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientReferenceCollection" /> of references discovered.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientReferenceCollection" /> de referências descobertas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection is populated during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> coleção é preenchida durante chamadas para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: During invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection together with references found in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Durante as chamadas para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> métodos, se a URL fornecida é um documento de descoberta válida, o documento será adicionado ao <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> coleção junto com referências encontrada no documento discovery.

trans-unit.source: References added during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods are not necessarily valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Referências adicionadas durante chamadas para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> métodos não são documentos de descoberta necessariamente válido.

trans-unit.source: During invocations to <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> references within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection are verified as being valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Durante chamadas para <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> faz referência dentro de <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> coleção são verificado como documentos de descoberta válida.

trans-unit.source: If they are valid and contain references, they are also added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se eles são válidos e contêm referências, eles devem ser adicionados para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a Web Form that populates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the details about the references in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property discovered during an XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir é um formulário da Web que preenche um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com os detalhes sobre as referências a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> propriedade descoberta durante uma descoberta de serviços da Web em XML.

trans-unit.source: The `PopulateGrid` method fills the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the references found in an invocation to <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O `PopulateGrid` método preenchimentos a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com as referências encontradas em uma chamada para <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo tem uma caixa de texto que aceita a entrada do usuário, que é uma possível ameaça à segurança.

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, a páginas da Web ASP.NET validam a entrada do usuário não inclui elementos HTML ou script.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de explorações de script](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

trans-unit.source: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions in the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References" /> property, as well as references found in referenced discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Resolve todas as referências a documentos de descoberta, esquemas de XSD (definição de esquema XML) e descrições de serviços na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References" />, bem como referências encontradas nos documentos de descoberta referenciados.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> resolve válido faz referência a ela localiza e as coloca no <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ambos <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> Baixe e verifique se os esquemas XSD e descrições de serviço do <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, os dois métodos diferem no modo como tratam documentos de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolves all references in discovery documents within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property; if a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolves just those discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolve todas as referências em documentos de descoberta no <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> propriedade; se um documento de descoberta contém referências a outros documentos de descoberta, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolve apenas os documentos de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>; whereas <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> resolves them all.
trans-unit.target: Documentos de descoberta encontrados nesses documentos de descoberta aninhados em um nível de profundidade não são resolvidos por <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>; enquanto <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> resolve todos eles.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> continua a resolver referências em documentos de descoberta aninhada até que não haja nenhuma referência a mais.

trans-unit.source: Errors occurring during the verification process done by <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Erros que ocorrem durante o processo de verificação feito por <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> não gerada no momento da ocorrência, mas em vez disso, coletados e adicionado para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a Web Form that populates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the details about the documents in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property together with the references found in each document during an XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir é um formulário da Web que preenche um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com os detalhes sobre os documentos a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> propriedade junto com as referências encontradas em cada documento durante uma descoberta de serviços da Web em XML.

trans-unit.source: The `PopulateGrid` method fills the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the results from a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> invocation followed by a call to <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O `PopulateGrid` método preenchimentos a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com os resultados de uma <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> invocação seguido por uma chamada para <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions in <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References" />, as well as references found in those discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Resolve todas as referências a documentos de descoberta, esquemas de XSD (definição de esquema XML) e descrições de serviços em <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References" />, bem como referências encontradas nesses documentos de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolve válido faz referência a ela localiza e as coloca no <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ambos <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> Baixe e verifique se os esquemas XSD e descrições de serviço do <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, os dois métodos diferem no modo como tratam documentos de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolves all references in discovery documents within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolve todas as referências em documentos de descoberta dentro do <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolves just those discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Se um documento de descoberta contiver referências a outros documentos de descoberta, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolve apenas os documentos de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>; whereas <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> resolve them all.
trans-unit.target: Documentos de descoberta encontrados nesses documentos de descoberta aninhados em um nível de profundidade não são resolvidos por <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>; enquanto <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> resolver todos eles.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> continua a resolver referências em documentos de descoberta aninhada até que não haja nenhuma referência a mais.

trans-unit.source: Errors occurring during the verification process done by <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Erros que ocorrem durante o processo de verificação feito por <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> não gerada no momento da ocorrência, mas em vez disso, coletados e adicionado para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a Web Form that populates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the details about the documents in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property together with the references found in each document during an XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir é um formulário da Web que preenche um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com os detalhes sobre os documentos a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> propriedade junto com as referências encontradas em cada documento durante uma descoberta de serviços da Web em XML.

trans-unit.source: The `PopulateGrid` method fills the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the results from a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> invocation followed by a call to <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O `PopulateGrid` método preenchimentos a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> com os resultados de uma <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> invocação seguido por uma chamada para <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The directory in which to save all documents currently in the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O diretório no qual salvar todos os documentos atualmente na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to create or overwrite containing a map of all documents saved.
trans-unit.target: O nome do arquivo a ser criado ou substituído contendo um mapa de todos os documentos salvos.

trans-unit.source: Writes all discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and Service Descriptions in the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents" /> property to the supplied directory and creates a file in that directory.
trans-unit.target: Grava todos os documentos de descoberta, esquemas de XSD (definição de esquema XML) e descrições de serviços na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents" /> para o diretório fornecido e cria um arquivo nesse diretório.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection" /> containing the results of all files saved.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection" /> que contém os resultados de todos os arquivos salvos.

trans-unit.source: The file created with the name of the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the directory specified by the directory parameter contains a map of saved discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions.
trans-unit.target: O arquivo criado com o nome do `topLevelFilename` parâmetro no diretório especificado pelo parâmetro de diretório contém um mapa de documentos de descoberta salvo, esquemas de definição de esquema XML (XSD) e descrições de serviços.

trans-unit.source: This file can be read in using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A> method to populate the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Esse arquivo pode ser lido usando o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A> para popular o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The format of the file is XML containing an serialized version of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile> class.
trans-unit.target: O formato do arquivo é XML que contém uma versão serializada do <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile> classe.

trans-unit.source: If a file exists with the same name as the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the `directory` parameter, that file is overwritten by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um arquivo com o mesmo nome que o `topLevelFilename` parâmetro no `directory` parâmetro, o arquivo será substituído pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: O `topLevelFilename` parâmetro deve incluir o caminho totalmente qualificado, se o arquivo não existe no diretório atual.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a Web Form that writes the results of a Web Services discovery to disk by invoking the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> method after calls to <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir é um formulário da Web que grava os resultados de uma descoberta de serviços da Web em disco invocando o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> método depois chamadas para <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>.
